title: Milestones & Mentions - Orbital Temple
heading: Milestones & Mentions
description: This multi-year artwork is a part of the 13th Mercosul Bienal in Porto Alegre, Brazil, curated by Marcelo Dantas. It has been longlisted for the Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. It has also won the ArtSat Category of the CubeDesign 2021 competition, promoted by the Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
